## Connection.disconnectInternal\_() method

Disconnect two blocks that are connected by this connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected disconnectInternal_(parentBlock: Block, childBlock: Block): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parentBlock | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | The superior block. |
|  childBlock | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | The inferior block. |

void
